xalan

Product Name*

Xalan-Java

Product Version*

2.6.0

Vendor or Owner Name*

Apache Software Foundation

Vendor or Owner Contact

 http://xml.apache.org

OpenOffice.org Contact*

Kevin B. Hendricks

Date of First Use / date of License

04/2004 / 1999

URL for Product Information*

 http://xml.apache.org/xalan-j/index.html

 URL for License*

 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

Purpose*

 Xalan-Java is an XSLT processor for transforming XML documents. When added along with xml-apis.jar and crimson.jar to JDK 1.3.x they provide the xml language features of JDK 1.4.x that are required to build and work with the Flat XML filter in the OpenOffice.org filter modules. These jars are needed for JDK 1.3.1 build and runtime capabilities for OpenOffice.org.

Type of Encryption*

none

Binary or Source Code?*

binary (100% java source code available on xml.apache.org)

Hosting agreement
